message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose a fair deal. I am offering it to you for $140. This is a great opportunity to get a top-notch product at a price slightly above its perceived value but still quite competitive. I believe you won't find a better offer elsewhere. Let me know if this works for you!
